org.chocosolver.solver.search.loop.lns

Class LargeNeighborhoodSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chocosolver.solver.search.loop.lns.LargeNeighborhoodSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ICause, IMonitorInterruption, IMonitorRestart, IMonitorSolution, ISearchMonitor

    public class LargeNeighborhoodSearch
extends Object
implements ICause, IMonitorSolution, IMonitorInterruption, IMonitorRestart
    How to branch a Large Neighborhood Search ? This class provides services to plug a LNS, it relies on a Neighbor computation, and enables fast restarts.
    See Also:
